question_en: What is 25% of 200?
If the ratio of boys to girls is 3:2 and there are 15 boys, how many girls are there?
question_np: यदि केटा र केटीको अनुपात ३:२ छ र १५ केटा छन् भने, कति केटी छन्?

question_en: What is the value of 15 + 8 × 2?
question_np: १५ + ८ × २ को मान कति हुन्छ?

question_en: A shopkeeper bought an item for Rs. 500 and sold it for Rs. 600. What is the profit percentage?
question_np: एक पसलेले रु. ५०० मा सामान किने र रु. ६०० मा बेचे। नाफा प्रतिशत कति हो?

question_en: What is the next number in the series: 2, 4, 8, 16, ?
If 5x = 25, what is the value of x?
question_np: यदि ५x = २५ भए, x को मान कति हो?

question_en: What is the average of 10, 20, 30, 40, and 50?
A train travels 120 km in 2 hours. What is its speed?
question_np: एउटा रेल २ घण्टामा १२० किमी यात्रा गर्छ। यसको गति कति हो?

question_en: What is 15% of 300?
If A is twice as old as B, and B is 10 years old, how old is A?
question_np: यदि A, B भन्दा दोब्बर उमेरको छ, र B १० वर्षको छ भने, A को उमेर कति हो?

question_en: The sum of two numbers is 50 and their difference is 10. What is the larger number?
question_np: दुई संख्याको योगफल ५० र फरक १० छ। ठूलो संख्या कति हो?

question_en: What is the square root of 144?
question_np: १४४ को वर्गमूल कति हो?

question_en: If a book costs Rs. 250 after a 20% discount, what was its original price?
question_np: यदि एउटा किताबको मूल्य २०% छुट पछि रु. २५० छ भने, यसको मूल मूल्य कति थियो?

question_en: What is 3/4 expressed as a percentage?
question_np: ३/४ लाई प्रतिशतमा व्यक्त गर्दा कति हुन्छ?

question_en: A rectangle has length 12 cm and width 8 cm. What is its area?
question_np: एउटा आयतको लम्बाइ १२ सेमी र चौडाइ ८ सेमी छ। यसको क्षेत्रफल कति हो?

question_en: If 3x + 5 = 20, what is the value of x?
question_np: यदि ३x + ५ = २० भए, x को मान कति हो?

question_en: What is the LCM of 12 and 18?
question_np: १२ र १८ को ल.स. कति हो?

question_en: A man invests Rs. 10,000 at 5% simple interest per annum. What will be the interest after 2 years?
question_np: एक व्यक्तिले रु. १०,००० लाई ५% साधारण ब्याजमा लगानी गर्छ। २ वर्ष पछि ब्याज कति हुन्छ?

question_en: What is the HCF of 24 and 36?
question_np: २४ र ३६ को म.स. कति हो?

question_en: If the perimeter of a square is 40 cm, what is the length of one side?
question_np: यदि एउटा वर्गको परिमिति ४० सेमी छ भने, एक भुजाको लम्बाइ कति हो?
